00029   class MaintenanceTask {
00030   public:

00035         m_retry_delay_seconds(retry_delay_seconds), m_attempts(0) { }
00036     MaintenanceTask() : m_retry(false), m_attempts(0) {
00037       boost::xtime_get(&start_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00038     }

00040       : m_retry(true), m_retry_delay_seconds(retry_delay_seconds),
00041         m_attempts(0) {
00042       boost::xtime_get(&start_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00043     }

00045     virtual ~MaintenanceTask() { }
00046     virtual void execute() = 0;
00047

00049       m_attempts++;
00050       return m_attempts;
00051     }
